title: My profile

embed.description: xXShadowDragonXx / Check out how much time xXShadowDragonXx (na) wasted on League of Legends.

body: I have a question regarding my account i changed my name the other day and when i looked up how many hrs I've played it only says 67 but I know i have way! more than that my previous username was EnriqueDGreat and when i look at that it no longer exists so my question is will this affect me on the veterans awards emotes for the upcoming change in preseason??

replies.body: It's a third party site, so it's not really accurate.  How much time you played doesn't also equate to how many games you've participated in, either.  Just hang tight until these start rolling out, and if you do see any issues feel free to reach out us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
